extendedInfo.description: ***** NO NEED TO ROOT YOUR DEVICE *****Display Recorder records your Android device screen in real time. You can now easily record whatâs going on on your Android device screen.List of features available on DisplayRecorder:1. Records directly to high quality H264 mp4.2. Records both video & audio.3. On-device YouTube uploading.4. Adjustable video orientation & quality settings.5. Adjustable audio quality settings.6. Hardware accelerated video encoding.Display Recorder uses little resources, youâre not limited in the video length, and it is generally much more stable. The app also allows you to export your videos directly to YouTube.

reviews.title: AWFUL!!!
reviews.comment: I wish I could say everyone else was wrong about this app. They weren\'t. It doesn\'t work on Nexus 7, don\'t download.
reviews.author: Sam Damon

reviews.title: Does not work on Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Same complaint as other users. Once you enable display recorder from PC it just goes back to the setup screen in app on the Android
reviews.author: Kevin Anderson

reviews.title: Un Happy
reviews.comment: A tablet is a computer why do we have to connect it on each reboot, I rather do tutorials on A windows in this case  Fix it and please listen to your customers.
reviews.author: Mark Moore

reviews.title: Not good at all
reviews.comment: When I tried to open this it turned of my tablet(nexus 7) and started making a weird noise thank god it didn\'t do sum thin to my tab don\'t install it, it is the worst and If possible to give 0 stars then I would
reviews.author: Caid McGarry

reviews.title: Its outdated!!!
reviews.comment: When I went to the url in the instructions to get the software the 404 was not found. I also could not find it on the Displayrecorder website and on the BUGUN website. It is impossible to use now!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Over all pretty good
reviews.comment: Really good for Acer tablet use it all the time but tried it on my nexus and wouldn\'t work for me, maybe try and fix that and we will all be happy about that
reviews.author: Amber Lee

reviews.title: Um
reviews.comment: On iOS it was perfect no software no PC needed. And it worked awesome.  I downloaded the software and hit record but it closed out like it was recording but when I went back into the app. It was back at the software instructions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work
reviews.comment: I followed the instructions, and when I finally got the software and clicked enable, it froze up and I had to close it with task manager. Now whenever I open it back up it gives me a no device found error message. Looking at the reviews it seems no one else has gotten it to work either. Do not get. It\'s just a waste of time.
reviews.author: Justin Howell

reviews.title: Galaxy Nexus
reviews.comment: the url does not work gives me a error and it wont let me get the enaber.zip and please fix this is like the only app that i can record my screen without root so ***PLEASE FIX***
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hey
reviews.comment: Hey guys,u say that it does not work on nexus,THEN IT DOES NOT MEAN IT WONT WORK ON OTHER DEVICE U STUPID!!!
reviews.author: Ilyas Yao

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: I used it, and I got to enable it, but when I record, I hide the app and do whatever I\'m doing, then when I go back to the app, it says to enable again. What the hell? This thing is not working, and when I go and check my recordings, it shows the time, but all of them are 0 bytes, in other words, it didn\'t record anything. If you\'re going to keep an app in the market, make sure it works.  For all of you that want to download the software, don\'t type the period in the end. For example, the website to download ends in \".zip\" and then on the app it has an extra period at the end like this \".zip.\" So just don\'t type the last period, and you should be able to download it!
reviews.author: Bruno Recillas

reviews.title: Does the job
reviews.comment: A lot of people are complaining about it not working or its too much trouble to re-enable on every boot. This app does work, and to my knowledge, it is the only screen recorder that doesnt require root access. As for the enabling on re-boot, its not difficult or time consuming.. Plug in the usb and click enable on the program.. My only problem with this app is the low capture rate. Recording at 5fps is not what i was looking for, but for video tutorials and non-game related recording this is fine. Thanks
reviews.author: Dan Argust

reviews.title: Well...
reviews.comment: Guess what, I\'m on an Asus Nexus 7 too, looks like we\'re out of luck. Tegra devices don\'t support stuff like this. BUGUN Software, you NEED to state this, it can ruin devices,band you will be responsible due to your lack of information. Please try to support Tegra devices (Especially TEGRA 3 please!!! )
reviews.author: James Easton

reviews.title: I\'m sick and tired of....
reviews.comment: Screenrecorders needing root or a computer pls make this this app that you dont need any of that junk and I bet more people will use this app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: The software doesn\'t work and the \"enabler\" app they ask you to download has all kinds of errors and misspellings in the URL. Even if you fix the obvious errors the URL doesn\'t work and the developer\'s website linked to here in the Play Store points to a directory that doesn\'t even exist on their server. I tried going through their Korean site to find if the page moved with no luck. Do not download.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: YeAkh bad
reviews.comment: Please guys don\'t download its the baddest app ever....oh god I will make video on this app
reviews.author: Hameed Abdullah

reviews.title: Piece if crap
reviews.comment: Link doesn\'t exist so I xan install to my pc

reviews.comment: this app is dumb..u gotta go through your pc and all!!might as well just root your device;(

reviews.title: the worst thing ever
reviews.comment: HOW! HOW u could write wrong link to enable recorder? I spent 30 minutes to find a mistake.
reviews.author: Andrew Kruk

reviews.title: No idea how to use it
reviews.comment: Sounds like a great app, and probably is... if you can get through the set-up. Practically impossible.
